name: find_patterns
description: Find patterns and relationships in data
prompt_template:
Analyze the following nodes and identify potential relationships between them. Focus on finding patterns, hierarchies, and semantic connections with a confidence level of at least {min_confidence}.

Nodes: {nodes}

Identify relationships of the following types:
- IS_A/SUBCLASS_OF (hierarchical)
- PART_OF/CONTAINS (compositional)
- RELATED_TO (general association)
- SIMILAR_TO (similarity)
- OPPOSITE_OF (contrast)
- USES/PRODUCES (functional)
- REGULATES (control)
- MEASURED_BY (metrics)

For each relationship, provide:
1. Relationship type
2. Source and target nodes
3. Confidence score (0.0-1.0)
4. Any relevant properties

properties.name: Solar energy
properties.definition: A renewable energy source that harnesses power from the sun

properties.name: Wind energy
properties.definition: A renewable energy source that harnesses power from wind

properties.name: Photovoltaic cells
properties.definition: Devices that convert sunlight directly into electricity
